name: JamRun IPTV
description: JamRun IPTV is the premier IPTV player designed exclusively for the Apple ecosystem. Featuring a stunning glass-styled interface that feels native to iOS and tvOS, JamRun delivers a premium streaming experience without the premium price tag. Unlike other IPTV apps that feel like afterthoughts on Apple devices, JamRun was built from the ground up with Apple's design language in mind. The app requires no account creation, collects zero user data, and offers fast, fluid navigation through your IPTV content. With support for M3U/M3U8 playlists, full EPG integration, and smart category organization, JamRun represents a new standard for IPTV on Apple TV, iPhone, and iPad.
shortDescription: Premium Apple-native IPTV player with stunning glass design
pros: Universal Apple support (iPhone, iPad, Apple TV, Mac, Vision Pro)
Fast channel browsing with smart categories
Full EPG and TV guide support
cons: Newer app with growing feature set

faqs.question: Is JamRun IPTV free?
faqs.answer: Yes, JamRun IPTV is completely free with no ads and no subscription required.

faqs.question: Does JamRun support EPG?
faqs.answer: Yes, JamRun fully supports EPG (Electronic Program Guide) for viewing TV schedules.

faqs.question: What devices does JamRun work on?
faqs.answer: JamRun works on iPhone, iPad, Apple TV, Mac, and Vision Pro - all Apple ecosystem devices.

faqs.question: Does JamRun collect user data?
faqs.answer: No, JamRun has a strict zero data collection policy and requires no account creation.

name: TiviMate
description: TiviMate is the most popular premium IPTV player for Android devices, known for its sleek interface, reliable EPG support, and extensive customization options. It offers both free and premium versions.
shortDescription: Premium IPTV player with EPG and recording

faqs.question: Is TiviMate free?
faqs.answer: TiviMate offers a free version with basic features. Premium features require a subscription at $9.99/year.

faqs.question: Does TiviMate support recording?
faqs.answer: Yes, TiviMate Premium supports DVR recording functionality to save live TV.

faqs.question: What devices does TiviMate work on?
faqs.answer: TiviMate works on Android phones, tablets, Firestick, Fire TV, Android TV, and Nvidia Shield.

faqs.question: Does TiviMate have EPG support?
faqs.answer: Yes, TiviMate has excellent EPG integration with customizable TV guide layouts.

name: IPTV Smarters Pro
description: IPTV Smarters Pro is a versatile cross-platform IPTV player supporting Xtream Codes API, M3U playlists, and multiple connections. Available on virtually all platforms.
shortDescription: Cross-platform IPTV player with Xtream support

faqs.question: Is IPTV Smarters Pro free?
faqs.answer: IPTV Smarters Pro offers a free version with ads. The full version costs $5.99 one-time.

faqs.question: Does IPTV Smarters support Xtream Codes?
faqs.answer: Yes, IPTV Smarters has native Xtream Codes API integration for easy provider setup.

faqs.question: What devices does IPTV Smarters work on?
faqs.answer: IPTV Smarters works on Android, iOS, Firestick, Windows, Mac, and Smart TVs.

faqs.question: Does IPTV Smarters have parental controls?
faqs.answer: Yes, IPTV Smarters includes parental control features to restrict content access.

name: Kodi
description: Kodi is a powerful open-source media center that can be transformed into an IPTV player using add-ons like PVR IPTV Simple Client. Highly customizable with thousands of skins and add-ons.
shortDescription: Open-source media center with IPTV add-ons

faqs.question: Is Kodi free?
faqs.answer: Yes, Kodi is completely free and open-source software.

faqs.question: Does Kodi support IPTV?
faqs.answer: Yes, Kodi supports IPTV through add-ons like PVR IPTV Simple Client for M3U playlists.

faqs.question: What devices does Kodi work on?
faqs.answer: Kodi works on Android, iOS, Windows, Mac, Linux, Firestick, Apple TV, and more.

faqs.question: Is Kodi difficult to set up for IPTV?
faqs.answer: Kodi requires installing and configuring add-ons for IPTV, which has a learning curve for beginners.

name: VLC Media Player
description: VLC is a free, open-source media player that supports IPTV streaming via M3U playlists. Simple to use but lacks advanced IPTV features like EPG.
shortDescription: Free media player with basic IPTV support

faqs.question: Is VLC free for IPTV?
faqs.answer: Yes, VLC is completely free and open-source with no ads or subscriptions.

faqs.question: Does VLC support EPG?
faqs.answer: No, VLC does not have built-in EPG support. It's designed as a basic media player.

faqs.question: What devices does VLC work on?
faqs.answer: VLC works on Android, iOS, Windows, Mac, and Linux.

faqs.question: Can VLC play M3U playlists?
faqs.answer: Yes, VLC can open and play M3U/M3U8 IPTV playlists directly.

name: GSE Smart IPTV
description: GSE Smart IPTV is a feature-rich IPTV player available on iOS and Android with support for Chromecast, EPG, and multiple playlist formats.
shortDescription: Feature-rich IPTV player with Chromecast support

faqs.question: Is GSE Smart IPTV free?
faqs.answer: GSE Smart IPTV has a free version with ads. The premium version costs $5.99 one-time.

faqs.question: Does GSE Smart IPTV support Chromecast?
faqs.answer: Yes, GSE Smart IPTV has built-in Chromecast support for casting to your TV.

faqs.question: What devices does GSE Smart IPTV work on?
faqs.answer: GSE Smart IPTV works on Android, iOS, Apple TV, and Firestick.

faqs.question: Does GSE Smart IPTV have EPG?
faqs.answer: Yes, GSE Smart IPTV supports EPG integration for TV guide functionality.

name: Perfect Player
description: Perfect Player is a set-top box style IPTV player for Android with a clean interface, EPG support, and efficient channel management.
shortDescription: Set-top box style IPTV player for Android

faqs.question: Is Perfect Player free?
faqs.answer: Yes, Perfect Player is completely free with no premium version required.

faqs.question: Does Perfect Player have EPG support?
faqs.answer: Yes, Perfect Player supports EPG for viewing TV program schedules.

faqs.question: What devices does Perfect Player work on?
faqs.answer: Perfect Player works on Android phones, tablets, Firestick, and Android TV.

faqs.question: Does Perfect Player support recording?
faqs.answer: No, Perfect Player does not have built-in recording capabilities.

name: OTT Navigator
description: OTT Navigator is a powerful IPTV/OTT player with support for Stalker, Xtream, and M3U playlists. Known for its reliability and feature set.
shortDescription: Powerful IPTV player with Stalker and Xtream support

faqs.question: Is OTT Navigator free?
faqs.answer: OTT Navigator offers a free version. Premium features cost $4.99/year.

faqs.question: Does OTT Navigator support Stalker portal?
faqs.answer: Yes, OTT Navigator has native Stalker portal support for IPTV providers.

faqs.question: Does OTT Navigator have recording?
faqs.answer: Yes, OTT Navigator supports DVR recording functionality in the premium version.

faqs.question: What devices does OTT Navigator work on?
faqs.answer: OTT Navigator works on Android phones, Firestick, and Android TV devices.

name: IPTV Extreme
description: IPTV Extreme is an Android IPTV player with recording capabilities, EPG support, and auto-updating playlists.
shortDescription: Android IPTV player with recording and auto-update

faqs.question: Is IPTV Extreme free?
faqs.answer: IPTV Extreme has a free version with ads. The pro version costs $4.99 one-time.

faqs.question: Does IPTV Extreme support recording?
faqs.answer: Yes, IPTV Extreme has DVR recording functionality to save live TV.

faqs.question: Does IPTV Extreme auto-update playlists?
faqs.answer: Yes, IPTV Extreme can automatically update your M3U playlists on a schedule.

faqs.question: What devices does IPTV Extreme work on?
faqs.answer: IPTV Extreme works on Android phones, tablets, Firestick, and Android TV.

name: Lazy IPTV
description: Lazy IPTV is a simple, lightweight IPTV player for Android devices. Basic but reliable for playing M3U playlists.

faqs.question: Is Lazy IPTV free?
faqs.answer: Yes, Lazy IPTV is completely free to use.

faqs.question: Does Lazy IPTV have EPG?
faqs.answer: No, Lazy IPTV does not have EPG support - it's designed as a simple, lightweight player.

faqs.question: What devices does Lazy IPTV work on?
faqs.answer: Lazy IPTV works on Android phones, tablets, Firestick, and Android TV.

faqs.question: Is Lazy IPTV good for beginners?
faqs.answer: Yes, Lazy IPTV is very simple and easy to use, making it ideal for beginners.

name: SS IPTV
description: SS IPTV is an IPTV player designed specifically for Smart TVs, particularly Samsung and LG models. Simple playlist loading via web interface.
shortDescription: IPTV player for Samsung and LG Smart TVs

faqs.question: Is SS IPTV free?
faqs.answer: Yes, SS IPTV is completely free to use on Smart TVs.

faqs.question: Does SS IPTV work on Samsung TVs?
faqs.answer: Yes, SS IPTV is available for Samsung Smart TVs through the app store.

faqs.question: Does SS IPTV have EPG?
faqs.answer: No, SS IPTV does not have built-in EPG support.

faqs.question: How do I add playlists to SS IPTV?
faqs.answer: You can upload playlists through the SS IPTV web interface using your TV's unique code.

name: Smart IPTV
description: Smart IPTV (SIPTV) is a popular IPTV app for Smart TVs with EPG support and playlist upload via MAC address.
shortDescription: Popular IPTV app for Smart TVs

faqs.question: Is Smart IPTV free?
faqs.answer: No, Smart IPTV costs $5.49 one-time payment after a 7-day trial.

faqs.question: Does Smart IPTV have EPG?
faqs.answer: Yes, Smart IPTV supports EPG when provided with your playlist.

faqs.question: What Smart TVs does Smart IPTV work on?
faqs.answer: Smart IPTV works on Samsung, LG, and other major Smart TV brands.

faqs.question: How do I upload playlists to Smart IPTV?
faqs.answer: Upload playlists via the siptv.app website using your TV's MAC address.

name: Televizo
description: Televizo is a modern IPTV player for Android with a clean Material Design interface, EPG support, and multi-screen viewing.
shortDescription: Modern IPTV player with Material Design

faqs.question: Is Televizo free?
faqs.answer: Televizo has a free version. Premium features cost $4.99 one-time.

faqs.question: Does Televizo have EPG support?
faqs.answer: Yes, Televizo has excellent EPG support with a modern Material Design interface.

faqs.question: Does Televizo support multi-screen?
faqs.answer: Yes, Televizo supports multi-screen viewing on compatible devices.

faqs.question: What devices does Televizo work on?
faqs.answer: Televizo works on Android phones, tablets, Firestick, and Android TV.

name: iPlayTV
description: iPlayTV is a premium IPTV player designed exclusively for iOS and Apple TV with native AirPlay support and picture-in-picture.
shortDescription: Premium IPTV player for iOS and Apple TV

faqs.question: Is iPlayTV free?
faqs.answer: No, iPlayTV costs $5.99 one-time with no free version available.

faqs.question: Does iPlayTV support AirPlay?
faqs.answer: Yes, iPlayTV has native AirPlay support for streaming to other Apple devices.

faqs.question: Does iPlayTV have picture-in-picture?
faqs.answer: Yes, iPlayTV supports picture-in-picture mode on compatible devices.

faqs.question: What devices does iPlayTV work on?
faqs.answer: iPlayTV works exclusively on iOS devices and Apple TV.

name: IPTV Pro
description: IPTV Pro is a simple yet effective IPTV player for Android with EPG support and auto-reconnect features.
shortDescription: Simple IPTV player with EPG support

faqs.question: Is IPTV Pro free?
faqs.answer: No, IPTV Pro costs $3.99 one-time with no free version.

faqs.question: Does IPTV Pro have EPG?
faqs.answer: Yes, IPTV Pro supports EPG for viewing TV schedules.

faqs.question: Does IPTV Pro have auto-reconnect?
faqs.answer: Yes, IPTV Pro automatically reconnects if your stream drops.

faqs.question: What devices does IPTV Pro work on?
faqs.answer: IPTV Pro works on Android phones, tablets, Firestick, and Android TV.

name: Xciptv Player
description: Xciptv (formerly Xtream IPTV Player) is a free player specifically designed for Xtream Codes API with EPG, VOD, and catchup support.

faqs.question: Is Xciptv free?
faqs.answer: Yes, Xciptv is free but contains ads.

faqs.question: Does Xciptv support M3U playlists?
faqs.answer: No, Xciptv only supports Xtream Codes API - not standard M3U playlists.

faqs.question: Does Xciptv have VOD support?
faqs.answer: Yes, Xciptv supports VOD (Video on Demand) content from your provider.

faqs.question: What devices does Xciptv work on?
faqs.answer: Xciptv works on Android phones, tablets, Firestick, and Android TV.
